channel.title: Npc vs npc
channel.description: i remember there was a tut for npcs fighting eachother, can someone give me a link? i've tried using search, but i can't figure out the proper phrase...

item.title: Npc vs npc
item.dc:creator: @Jorsa Jorsa
item.description:
@Jorsa wrote:

in the npc process, make it loop through all the players, find whos near them, and if theres more then one, find the lowest combat out of them, and that can be the target.

i would make the code, but i dont have any sources on my comp, except for my own.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc vs npc
item.dc:creator: @Waterslasher Waterslasher
item.description:
@Waterslasher wrote:

i remember thebeanie made a npc vs npc tut, but it was deleted[br][size=1]Posted on: March 06, 2007, 04:46:59 AM[/size][hr]there definetely was one, but i didn’t do it because i was a noob.
now though… i reckon i could do it[br][size=1]Posted on: March 06, 2007, 04:47:42 AM[/size][hr][quote=“messing with java, post:6, topic:64970”]o0 im going to mess with java and npc files for this 1 i think i can truely make a good command that works then ill post a tut[/quote]
Cool, notify me of the tut when you’re done!
